title: Helloooooo, Innsbruck
caption: Helloooooo, Innsbruck
desc: We're featuring the Four Hills Tournament, a set of four ski jump events which starts today, with an image from the 2017/2018 competition. This annual event, which wraps up in early January, starts in the German towns of Oberstdorf and Garmisch-Partenkirchen and then moves to Austria, with events in Innsbruck (pictured here) and Bischofshofen.
copyright: German ski jumper Markus Eisenbichler competing in the Four Hills Tournament, Innsbruck, Austria, on 3 January 2018 (Â© Daniel Karmann/picture alliance via Getty Images)
